title: Squatters - SLC Airport
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 21+ age only pub at Concourse C Terminal 2 by gate C3. Offers a few labeled vegan breakfast choices (all day) plus veggie burger and veggie wrap. Other vegan items possible by request.
streetAddress: Concourse C Terminal 2, Salt Lake City International Airport
